title: Open-air, green-solvent processed organic solar cells with efficiency approaching 18% and exceptional stability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01944J, Paper
Thi Le Huyen Mai, Zhe Sun, Seoyoung Kim, Seonghun Jeong, Seunglok Lee, Jeewon Park, Changduk Yang
H75-2F, a fluorinated cathode material, boosts organic solar cell efficiency, achieving 19.44% PCE in controlled conditions and 17.78% with open-air green-solvent processing, while offering strong thermal and moisture stability.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
